The video footage shows a woman wearing: shirt and a black backpack picking up a red object from the floor and throwing it towards several police officers.
The traditional Chinese language caption: That’s a female rioter!!!” and “Live video shows a female rioter hurled a fire extinguisher at police officers!”
The video was taken from a Facebook live: where the woman can be seen throwing a box, not a fire extinguisher.
The Stand News video: which also captured the same scene at Sha Tin station, shows the woman picking up a square, red box from the station floor, which corresponds with packaging for mooncakes produced by local bakery Kee Wah.
